Package oogasalad.engine.controller

Class DefaultEngineFileConverter

java.lang.Object
oogasalad.engine.controller.DefaultEngineFileConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EngineFileConverterAPI
public class DefaultEngineFileConverter extends Object implements EngineFileConverterAPI
Default implementation of the EngineFileAPI Used for converting the level data to game objects and event actions
Author:
Alana Zinkin

  • Method Details

    • saveLevelStatus

      public void saveLevelStatus() throws IOException, DataFormatException
      Saves the current game or level status by: 1) Gathering current state from the Engine (objects, progress, scores) 2) Converting them into a parser-compatible data structure 3) Delegating the final write operation to GameFileParserAPI
      Specified by:
      saveLevelStatus in interface EngineFileConverterAPI
      Throws:
      IOException - if underlying file operations fail
      DataFormatException - if the data cannot be translated into the parser's model

    • loadFileToEngine

      public Map<String,GameObject> loadFileToEngine(LevelData levelData)
      Loads a new level or resumes saved progress by translating the standardized LevelData structure created by the File Parser into the Engine’s runtime objects
      Specified by:
      loadFileToEngine in interface EngineFileConverterAPI
      Returns:
      Map of the String of the UUID to the newly instantiated GameObject
